action: Clicked on the expense report (the top one)
description: The list of expenses within that expense report.

action: Clicked on the Hotel expense. It opened the side bar. Clicked on the side bar, and selected Actions and then Itemize.
description: The Itemize expense view. This shows the subcategory, start date, daily rate and quantity.

action: Click on new to add a new itemization. Pick the category, the start date, the daily rate and the quantity.
description: A new expense that has been itemized.
